kyang nam mkha' la rin po che sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste/ dngul dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang /
byu ru dang / dngul can dang / sa le sbram dang / rdo'i snying po dang / g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / de lta bu'i rin po che'i char dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du mngon par rab
tu 'bab par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / tshig
rtsub cing bslang ba dang / dug rnams thams cad kyi thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du bde ba dang / nad ma mchis pa dang / 'thab
mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba dag ma mchis pa dang / lo legs pa dag kun tu gnas par gyur cig /sems can gang dag gis rin po che de dag mthong ba dang /
reg pa dang / longs spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig /sku gdung de dag kyang slar gser
gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig/ //bam po bcu gcig pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du mtshon gyi
bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na'ang de dag nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil dag tu kun nas gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas/
'di lta ste/ me tog mnad ra ba dang / mnad ra ba chen po dang / pa ri ya tra ka dang / me tog 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig/
me tog gi char de dag las kyang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / sgra yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag
'byung bar gyur cig /yang sku gdung de dag kyang slar 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du kun tu gnas par gyur cig /de bzhin du gang gi tshe mu ge'i bskal pa bar
ma'i dus kyi tshe na'ang sku gdung de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gyen du 'phags nas me tog gi char gyi bar du sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /nad kyi bskal
pa bar ma'i bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /ji ltar bskal pa chen po bzang po la bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams ston pa'i mdzad pa
bgyid par 'gyur zhing / 'dul ba bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig /de bzhin du bskal pa chen po sangs
rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag byung gi bar du'ang / bdag gi sku gdung rnams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god
par gyur cig /bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na/ gang dag bdag gis dang por bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing rab tu bkod pa rnams dang / bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu
bkod pa de dag slad kyis gang gi tshe bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis
pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sha stag tu gyur te 'byung bar gyur cig /bdag byang chub thob nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang
dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can rnams dang / gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pas bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang slad kyis bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i
klung stong gi bye ma snyed byung zhing 'das par gyur pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di skad du gang yun ring po na bskal pa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po de dag la bab pa na/ rgyal
ba nyi ma bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa des bdag cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/ /bdag cag ni sems kyi rgyud tshig pa/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa mtshams med pa byed pa/ log par lta ba'i bar du gyur pa yin
na des bdag cag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pas na de'i phyir bdag cag da ltar thams cad mkhyen par gyur cing / rnam pa
thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyis 'khor lo bskor la/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo zlog cing sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la
rab tu 'god par byed pa yin no zhes bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing sgrogs la dbyangs kyang brjod par gyur cig /gang dag byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bdag gis bsngags pa dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa thos par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na de ltar rtsod pa'i dus la bab cing snyigs ma lnga byung bar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces yongs su zhu bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gi snying rje
chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'di'ang ston par gyur cig /byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rgya chen po la mos par gyur cig /de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen
po bskyed par 'gyur zhing / de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge
ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rab tu 'dzin par gyur pa de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa bdo ba'i rtsod pa'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin
byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du de lta bu'i lung bstan pas lung ston par gyur cig/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag kyang sems can byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skad du yun ring po 'di srid cig na rgyal ba nyi
ma mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna
tshogs dag dang / rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag mdzad de/ de'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pa dag gis nged cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu bskul nas/ nged cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pas dang po sems bskyed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag la brtson par

byas so zhes bdag gi sku gdung gi rnam par 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi tshul dag rgya cher ji ltar sngar smos pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig /de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul
gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar lha dang /dri za dang / mi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po lnga brgya po
de dag btab nas des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang / 'thab mo dang /
snyigs ma bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa na 'jig rten ldongs shing 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / lta ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig
rten na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / sngar smos pa lta bu'i bar dag la bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam

btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad sgrub par rngo thogs pa lta na byang chub kyi slad du smon pa spang bar mi bgyi zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang zhing gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar mi
bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ni bdag gi nges pa lags so/ /yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'tshal/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'ang mi 'tshal/ lha
dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid kyang mi 'tshal/ lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang mi 'tshal/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyi longs spyod kyang mi
'tshal/ lhar skye ba'ang mi 'tshal/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding du skye ba'ang mi 'tshal la dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan du yongs
su bsngo bar yang mi bgyid de/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye/ thos pas ni shes rab chen por
'gyur/ bsgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs la/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos
pas ni re ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang bdag gis kyang spyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / thos
pa las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dag bsgrubs pas na/ gal te bdag gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/
de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba mnar med par rab tu rtsub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i
sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des de dag de nas ldang bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mi 'thob par gyur cig/
de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur zhing mchog nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gyur cig /sems can de dag gi las kyi
'bras bu yongs su ma bas par gyur na'ang de'i slad du bdag gum nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing /bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang mi rtsol ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig /bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig /bdag gi lus re res kyang ji
ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig bu 'dis bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal bar gyur
cig /bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi bzad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong bar gyur cig /da ltar phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mnar med pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i
las yang dag par gsog par 'gyur ba rnams dang / sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar
dag 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa'i las kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba'am/ kun
nas slong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi don du bdag las des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bdag gi sems can
dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig /sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las brgal
bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las kun nas bslang ba dang / 'phangs pa dang / myong bar 'gyur
bar nges pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tsha ba dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / ngu 'bod dang / bsdus gzhom dang / thig nag dang / yang
sos kyi bar dag la'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag la'ang brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten
la'ang brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la'ang brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du grul bum dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dag la'ang brjod
par bgyi'o/ /gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sems can rnams sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs
par gyur pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du 'on pa dang / long pa dang / lce ma mchis pa dang / lag pa ma mchis pa dang / rkang pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa rab tu
nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du'ang bdag sems can dmyal ba mnar
med pa dag tu skye bar gyur cig /gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na/ 'khor bar sems can rnams yun
ring po ji srid du khams dang / skye mched dang / phung po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro
dang | yi dwags dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / srin po rnams su mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis de ltar
sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur cig /ji ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba
lta na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gi dpang du gyur cig /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis dpang du 'gyur zhing ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig /btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag sgrub par rngo thogs shing bdag bskal ba bzang po la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ba lta na bdag bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa de dag thams cad mchi ma rab tu 'dzag bzhin du yan lag lngas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod
kyis dran pa zab mo thob pa dang / sems can zab mo rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang / smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems
can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /
ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam des na sems can rnams kyi sman dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du gyur par shes so/ /
sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu thar bar bya ba'i smon lam btab pa de bzhin du khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par yang gyur cig /rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid kyang du zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa/ e ma'i mchog tu zab pa po//
khyod ni bde la mi gnas te/ /khyod ni sems can snying rje ldan/ /khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin/ /de bzhin du sbyar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ sems can chags pa
pa dag la khyod ma chags/ /dbang po rta thul rnams las dbang rta thul/ /dbang po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de/ /gzungs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod
du 'gyur/ /de bzhin du sbyar te mthu chen thob kyis smras pa/ sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams/ /dge ba'i don du kun nas 'das pa dag /mchog tu dka' ba'i sdug
bsngal chen po yi/ /khyod ni snying rje la ni ngu bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ brtson 'grus ting 'dzin brtan pa dang / /mkhas pa dang ni shes rab
mchog /phreng ba dri dang byug pa yis/ /de phyir khyod la mchod par 'os/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa/ snying rje chen pos sems can la/ /de ltar khyod
kyis sbyin pa byin/ /khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang / /mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces
smras so/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba/ /de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas/ /khyod kyis sems can 'jigs med la/ /byang chub spyod pa dag kyang bstan/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ /sems can la brtse gzhan med de/ /gang phyir shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog /khyod ni yon
tan kun dang ldan/ /spos kyi seng ges smras pa/ khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na ni/ /bzang la nyon mongs bdud kyi tshe/ /sems can sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing / /khyod kyi grags dang snyan pa
'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ skye ba'i dgon par brtson gyur cing / /log sgyus shin tu nyam nga ba/ /sha za ba dang khrag 'thung ba'i/ /sems rgyud tshig
rnams bzung bar gyur/ /mi 'khrugs pas smras pa/ ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs chud cing / /nyon mongs 'dam du byin gyur la/ /mtshams med pa dag byed pa po/ /sems rgyud tshig rnams
bzung bar gyur/ /spos kyi glang pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba/ /ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /dam pa'i chos ni spong byed pa'i/ /sems rgyud tshig rnams
bzung bar gyur/ /rin po che tog gis smras pa/ ye shes tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang / /snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/ /'phags la skur ba 'debs byed pa/ /sems rgyud tshig rnams
bzung bar gyur/ /'jigs dang gdung bral gyis smras pa/ khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam du/ /sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba/ /chang ba stong 'drar gnas gyur pa/ /sems
rgyud tshig rnams bzung ba gyur/ /lag na ut+pa las smras pa/ khyod kyi snying rje ye shes dang / /brtson 'grus kyis ni 'khor ba bcom/ skye dang 'chi bas gzir gyur pa/ /sems rgyud
tshig rnams bzung bar gyur/ /ye shes grags pas smras pa/ nad mang dag gis nyen pa dang / /nyon mongs rlung gis ded pa dag /ye shes chu yis zhi
byas te/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom/ /gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni nyi ma bzhin/ /nyon mongs dra ba rab bcom ste/ /nyon mongs zad cing rnam thar pa'i/ /
brtson 'grus brtan pa nged la med/ /ut+pa la zla bas kyang smras pa/ ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa yang dag mos/ /srid pa'i 'ching bas rab
bsdams pa/ /khams gsum po dag grol bar byed/ /dri med dbang pos smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi/ /snying rje chen po dag bstan pa/ snying rje'i rgyu las byung
ba po/ /khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa/ nyon mongs ldan pa'i rtsod dus tshe/ /byang chub gang dag khyod la rten/ /khyod kyis nyon
mongs brtsad nas bcad/ /smon lam brtan pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /skar ma skyong gis kyang smras pa/ ye shes mdzod dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /dri med smon lam btab pa yis/ /byang
chub spyod phyir sems can gyi/ /sman dang rten du khyod 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par ston pa ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag
lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/ kye ma shes sgron sems can rnams/ /nyon mongs nad rnams rnam par bcom/ /khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can/ /sems can sdug bsngal
grol bar mdzad/ /rigs kyi bu/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang bcas pa dag gis kyang bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo
sbyar te don dang / tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs
pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa dang / de nas de'i mod la sa cher g.yos par gyur cing phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi sa'ang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ /kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ /ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg
cing / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur gyi bar du gyur nas yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag tu'ang snang ba chen po byung bar gyur
cing me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog mnad ra ba dang / me tog mnad ra ba dang / mnad ra ba chen po dang / 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi
me tog gi char de lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
dag gi spyan snga na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sa g.yos pa de mthong nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa'
de dag gis 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing / me tog gi char chen po'ang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/
rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus so/ /yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che bsags pa de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po
che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa
rin chen zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po dag rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen
ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i
chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston ba bshad pa dang / srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub tu smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung ba'i bar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad
dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams med
pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs la/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig
pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de
bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar zhing 'dug
nas de'i bsngags pa'ang rjod par byed do/ /sems can chen po de'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to/ /gang gi
tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag g.yos shing me tog char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges pa
bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu
bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin
gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul dag bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrugs bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs
su bzung ste/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su
bzung bar gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid
cig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni da gdod bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po
che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der deng la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa
med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang nyon cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs
pa rin chen zla ba skyes bu dam pa khyod la 'dri bar mdzad de/ /me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di'ang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar

sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sgras gang bar gyur te/
des na khyod kyis thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ming rab tu thob pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la'ang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i

bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu'ang / yang dang yang du khyod kyi
snyan pa dang grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la
bkod par gyur te/ de la kha cig smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag
ni phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid
thob cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang
smros shig /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis kyis tshig mthun par gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ba/dag cag
kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing / me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa
de'ang blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de'i dus
la dbab par shes na deng la/ der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang nyon
cig /rigs kyi bu/ de nas rin po che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa blangs te/ byang chub
sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bsags pa nas 'phags nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ glog
bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen bsags pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi dzam+bu'i tshal gyi
skyed mos tshal 'dir lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos
phyag btsal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze
la thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems
dpa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i snying rje chen po dang
ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyir phyogs te/ bram ze la me tog phul nas 'di skad ces
smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod la
legs so zhes bya ba'ang spring ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa dag nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa dang / bram ze
la me tog bskur ba dang / yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba spring ba'ang ji ltar sngar smos ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams pa gam gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam
gyis bsgyings pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng+ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to/ /'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po gnyis la gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i tog ces bya/ cig shos ni seng+ge rdo rje'i tog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
seng+ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni
gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med/ grangs med pa gzhan dang
gzhan dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa'i
bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /yang de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul pa yangs
pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
par snang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng+ge ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan la sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab pa ci las gyur ces don de yongs su zhus pa'i bar du'ang ji ltar
sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /yang de'i tshe na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa de na 'jig
rten gyi khams ngur smrig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig theg pa
chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gnyis la gcig ni mi g.yo brtan pa zhes bya/ cig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la/ btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus pa'i bar du'ang ji
ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /yang de'i tshe na 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na 'jig rten
gyi khams gti mug mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/ cig shos ni rnam
par snang byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /yang de'i tshe na steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis 'bum 'das
pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa
rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi
chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod pa la gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag
par 'khrugs pa zhes bya/ cig shos ni byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba ste/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par
gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag
'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod
de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing
yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /de na byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa
des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams med pa byed
cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de gcig bu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa bya ba spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa
bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa'ang rjod par byed do/ /sems can chen po de'ang bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to/ /gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo
g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
dag gis chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos shing / 'gul ba dang / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta
bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs
pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul bstan to// //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu/
de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa
dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis
snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid cig
tu byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni
gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam
grangs de'ang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog der deng la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis
dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar mdzad de/ me tog zla ba ma dog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag
kyang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu sgras gang bar gyur cing / snying rje chen po'i sgra'ang rab tu thob pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir na khyod ni theg pa chen po
la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la'ang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang
yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal ba grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi
rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar
'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag
par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod
par gyur te/ de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su bzung
ba dag dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun tu bkab par gyur to/ /gang dag khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs
rgyas nyid thob cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas khyod nyid las brtsams shing bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na/ skyes bu dam pa
khyod legs so/ /zhes kyang smros shig /yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis lags so zhes bgyi ba spring zhig /me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de'ang
blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu dag/ de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed cag deng la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos
kyi rnam grangs de'ang nyon cig /rigs kyi bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par
rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa
dag blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di'i dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal du lhags te phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo / /yang de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i
rigs kyi bu dag dang / lha rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis 'di ltar yongs su gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i
tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi
bu rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis yongs su gang zhing khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i
zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te bsngags pa brjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub
sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag
bskur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das
kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag phul nas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog
rab rgyas kyis khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di bskur zhing / skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin te/ yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes
bya ba brjod pa'i bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /me tog gang yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu char bzhin du rab tu 'bab pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag
tu dge ba'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun gyis gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / snang ba'i sgra dang / pha
rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gag

pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa chen po'i sgra dang / snying rje chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang
bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi sgra ste/ me tog gi char chen po de dag gis dge ba'i sgra de lta bus
sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/ gang dag
'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhags pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas sangs
rgyas kyi mthu dang / smon lam gyi dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes
bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag
rtogs 'dir lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la'ang mchod pa byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thob par 'khod do/ /
rigs kyi bu/ mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag gis mchod
pa byas te gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
rin po che'i snying po ting nge 'dzin glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin des thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog rin po che
sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur nas ri dang / shing ljon pa rnams dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / sa gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang ngo //
sems can gang dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kha cig ni ser po/ kha cig ni dkar po/ kha cig
ni btsod kha/ kha cig ni dmar po/ kha cig ni nag po/ kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/ kha cig gi lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu snang / kha cig ni me lta bur/ kha cig ni nam mkha'
lta bur/ kha cig ni smig rgyu lta bur/ kha cig ni chu lta bur/ kha cig ni ri lta bur/ kha cig ni tshangs pa lta bur/ kha cig ni brgya byin lta bur/ kha cig ni me tog lta bur/ kha cig
ni nam mkha' lding lta bur/ kha cig ni seng+ge lta bur/ kha cig ni nyi ma lta bur/ kha cig ni zla ba lta bur/ kha cig ni skar ma lta bur/ kha cig ni bya rgod
lta bu dang / kha cig ni wa lta bu dag tu kun tu snang ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su
kun tu snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de na sems can gang dag gis rang rang gi lus ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
snying po'i sku'ang mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po rin po che'i sna bdun
gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze ba la bzhugs bar mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de na sems can gang dag sa dang nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba'i sems
can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku'ang de ltar mthong ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/ thugs
thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig bu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bram ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las yang
dag par 'das pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang / 'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /bram ze/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me
tog gi shing phun sum tshogs pa zhig kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / reg pa sna tshogs dang / 'dab ma sna tshogs dang / sdong bu sna tshogs dang / rtsa ba sna tshogs
dang / sman gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod do/ /de la me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni dpag tshad brgyar/ kha cig gis ni dpag tshad nyis brgyar/ kha cig gis ni
dpag tshad sum brgyar lhang nge lhan ner byed cing de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhang nge lhan
ner byed la/ de na sems can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis me tog de'i dri bsnams na ni mig dag thob par 'gyur/ 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur
yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po dag gis
gces par gyur pa de dag gis dri bsnams na ni nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag myos pa
dang / brgyal ba dang / smyos pa dang / rengs pa dang / sems rmugs pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis me tog de dag
gi dri bsnams na ni dran pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/ me tog gi shing de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po mkhrang ba/ sra ba/ rdo rje las grub pa/ 'jam pa/
sdong bu ni bai DUR+ya/ 'dab ma ni gser/ ze'u 'bru ni rdo'i snying po/ ze ba mu tig dmar po/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhin stong / rgyar ni dpag tshad 'bum
yod pa gcig cig skyes par gyur la/ pad+ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang dris phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu
khyab cing lhang nge lhan ner 'gyur la/ bram ze/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi

gang dag lus mi mthun pa dang / nad kyis nyen pa dang / yan lag mthun pa dang / nad kyis nyen pa dang / yan lag nyams pa dang / myos pa dang / brgyal ba dang / myos pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / dran pa
rab tu nyams pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
zhing dran pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag gi ro la pad+ma
dkar po de'i 'od zer dag gis phog gam/ dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po 'thob par 'gyur zhing / yang phyis langs te mdza' bshes dang / snag gi
gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba
dang / gang dag yang de nas shi 'phos par 'gyur pa de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la/ de dag der tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing yun
ring por gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na/ bram ze/ me tog gi shing de ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i
'dus pa 'di'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba nye bar gnas pa'i dus na me tog de dag kha bye zhing rab tu rgyas bar gyur nas lhang nge lhan ne/
shing kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya/ kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas sems can mang po de dag gi nad sna tshogs rab
tu zhi bar byed pa de ltar ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa byung ba yin no/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i 'od zer dag gis me tog de dag kha
phye zhing lam me lhang nge lhan ner gyur nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar ni skyes bu dam pa nga 'jig rten du byung ste/
thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing kha phye nas yang dang yang du sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag
la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang / khyod kyis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas nga la phul ba de dag thams cad kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi
zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung / kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhing / rang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas
kyang lung bstan pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis nga'i thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems
can bsam pa dag pa/ gdul sla ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung bas na de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya
ste| de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba dag la 'jug pa ma yin no/ /byang chub sems
dpa' de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 'tshol ba ma yin te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi
zhing yongs su dag pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni snying brtse ba spangs pa yin no/ /gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa dag yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ye shes dang / bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin no/ /gang dag
ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas spangs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa/ bud med rnam par spangs pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs
su spangs pa theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston par gyur cig /bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur te/ yun ring du gnas shing
bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang / gdul sla ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /ces smon lam
de lta bu 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni des na ye shes dang / bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa'ang ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
kha dog du ma/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu bkye'o/ /'od zer de dag tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogs su dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing rnams snang bar byas nas/ de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can de na mi rnams ni tshe lo bcu pa mdog ngan pa/
mi sdug pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste/ khrun ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam mo/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la
dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i khrun yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang / mthe bo can gyi mi rnams kyi khru gsum dang /
sor bdun gyi tshad tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston to/ /rigs
kyi bu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / mi de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa
'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
de| srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de
rab tu bkod do/ /sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
smon lam btab ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo / /kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa snyigs
ma lnga dang ldan pa dag yongs su bzung ngo / /de na sems can chen po des nga'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing
bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas nas/ der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar smon lam btab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa des kyang nga la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lnga shin tu bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam nga
bar zhugs pa dag smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na
bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes pho nyan btang ste/ snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar
ming btags so/ /nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de da ltar 'jig
rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des
mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ des dang po bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir pho nya
dag btang ngo / /des dang po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod
pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro/ /bram ze/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na sems can tshe ring ba/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs
rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur
sangs rgyas nyid thob nas sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
mang po lhag par mdzad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa la ltos/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing
shin tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing
smon lam khyad par can btab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sems can
dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams
yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu
zhes bya ste/ gang dag shin tu dul ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no/ /bram ze/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan
thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ des ni byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams zhes bya'i/ pad+ma dkar po lta bu'ang ma yin la sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang
mi bya ste/ bram ze/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
ma dag pa yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su
bzung ba lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
yongs su ma dag par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi thung ba zhig bar mar sgrub par
smon pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dkar po lta bu rnams zhes bya'i/ me tog lta bu rnams zhes mi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes
kyang bya'o/ /bram ze/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med
pa rnams kyi nang du dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje pad+ma dkar po lta bur skyes pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas mtshams med pa byed pa
dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ pho nya dag
kyang btang nas khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod pa'i
las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das nas lhag
ma bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing
rga ba dang / 'chi ba mang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa/ 'dren pa med pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing / sems can lam ngan
pas bcom pa/ nyam nga ba chen po thob pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nas
ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur
te| 'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog /chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/ dbang sgyur ba'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcil te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu sgras khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang lhan
cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du/ lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe
ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal pa tshad med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag byed par
'gyur ba de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin
gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po dag byed par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med
pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par gyur to/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang lus las skyes
pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mjed pa mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te/ sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du
yun ring por sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe na gnas grong zhes bya ba na bram ze zhig yod pa des 'di
skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing /
byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang / grogs byed par gyur nas khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig /khyod srid pa tha mar gyur pa na bdag khyod kyi
phar gyur cig /skyes bu dam pa/ bdag khyod kyis byang chub thob par sbyin bdag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu dul ba'i blo zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag ces
bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyur cig /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /rgyu skar gyi lha mo chu lha spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma
pa'i bar du gyur pa na bdag khyod la bsnun pa'i ma ma byed pa'i mar gyur cig /khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par
gyur cig /brgya byin mu khyud can zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang brgya byin pha rol sems zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/ kye snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de
dag ces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nyan thos zung du gyur cig /gzhan
yang brgya byin spyad spyod lta mdzes tshogs zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang khyod de dang de dag ces bya ba nas srid pa tha ma'i bar
du gyur pa'i bur gyur cig /gzhan yang ri rtse'i lha mo des pa king+shu ka zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi
btsun mor gyur cig/ khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /lha ma yin gyi dbang po mdzes
spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod
la byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur te/ khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig /khyod srid pa tha ma
bar gyur pa la yang bdag bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir
gsol ba 'debs par gyur cig /khyod kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyur cig /chos kyi bcud kyang 'thung bar gyur cig /
'chi ba med pa'ang rtogs par gyur cig /nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar yang thob par gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na lha dang / klu
dang / lha ma yin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir smon lam btab ste 'dul ba dag kyang nye bar
bkod do/ /de na 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed ces bya ba gcig cig 'dug pa des smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po/ bdag kyang khyod la yo byad mang po dag gis grogs
byed par gyur cig /bdag bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag tu khyod la 'bras bu dang bcas par spyod cing nye bar 'tsho ba'i nye dur gyur cig/ rtag tu dngos po bslang ba'i don

du khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'gro bar gyur cig /mal cha dang / stan dang / bgo ba dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khyim dang /
bu dang / bu mo dang / sha dang / khrag dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lce dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mgo dag slong bar gyur cig /
bram ze chen po/ bdag de ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi grogs su'ang gyur cig /bram ze chen po/
bdag de ltar khyod byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi grogs su gyur cig /nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nyan thos kyi gnas
thob par gyur cig /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzin par gyur cig /rjes su chos ston par gyur cig /khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
lung ston par gyur cig /rigs kyi bu/ bram ze snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas
phyag byas nas 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed la bos te smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nga'i bla na med pa'i spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /
khyod tshe rabs khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du nga la dngos po slong ba'i phyir nam 'ongs pa de'i tshe ngas kyang sems rab tu
dang bas sbyin par bya ste/ khyod la'ang bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur cig /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
phrag dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bdag gi
mdun du slong mo pa gang dag mchis nas zas slong bar bgyid cing tshig 'jam po'am/ tshig rtsub po'am/ brnyas pa'i tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas slong
bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis slong mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems
bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas sbyin pa rtsol par gyur na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs
ma mchis pa gzhan dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis bslus par gyur cig /bdag kyang bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis slong mo pa la sems ma dad
pas sbyin pa stsol tam/ sbyin pa de'ang len pa po la ma dad pas byin par 'gyur zhing chud za bar 'gyur ram/ gal te tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig dge
ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig /gal te skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig
len pa po'i dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na bdag kyang mnar med par mchi bar gyur cig /zas la ji lta ba de bzhin du slong mo pa gang dag bdag
la gos dang / mgo'i bar dag slong bar 'gyur zhing tshig 'jam po'am/ tshig rtsub po'am/ brnyas tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas ma go'i bar dag slong bar bgyid na/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis slong mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems
bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas mgo bo'i bar dag yongs su gtong bar gyur na/ bdag gis
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag mnar med par mchi ba'i bar du gyur cig /sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims
nas shes rab kyi bar dag yongs su gtong ba la'ang brjod par bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyis
smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang /
lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang thal mo sbyar te 'khor nas de la legs so zhes bya ba yin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la
gnas pa'i yid kyis smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ni snying por 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos drug gis
sems can rnams yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar sbyin pa len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed des smon
lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam btab bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
po dang ldan pa des ji ltar 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed kyis smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam de lta bu dag btab
pa thos pa dang / de nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas
te mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis smras pa/ a la la bdag chos kyi mu ge dang / zad pa'i dus dang / nyon mongs pa chen pos dkrugs shing rtsod pa'i dus na snyigs ma
lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi mgon med pa'i ded dpon dang / snang ba byed pa dang / sgron ma byed pa dang / byis pa skyabs med pa dang / ldongs pa rnams kyi lam ston par
'gyur ba dang / 'di ltar bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas tshe rabs gzhan dag tu gang dag bdag gi mgo len par 'gyur ba dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna
dang / lce dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / kha zas kyi bar dag len par 'gyur zhing / bla na med
pa'i byang chub kyis spyod pa'i grogs byed pa de lta bu dag rnyed pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshe rabs gzhan gyi bskal pa bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag nas byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du bdag gi drung du slong mo pa gang dag nye bar mchis par 'gyur zhing
yun ring po de srid kyi bar du zas sam/ skom dag blangs par gyur pa dang / bdag gis sug pa nas tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin pa blangs par gyur pa'i sems
can de dag/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gal te 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar mi bgyid dam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen pos lung ston par mi bgyid na/ bdag gis gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji ltar sngon de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rtse 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang
phyug 'od zer gyi spyan sngar dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam 'di lta bu btab ste/ skyes bu dam pa des smon lam ji ltar btab
pa de bzhin du bskal pa chen po gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu lhag pa de snyed du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas/ 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas
kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer so sor rtog pa zhes bya bar skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang
dag mtho zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur cing / lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po lha ma
med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs so/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ye tog rtul phal byang chub dbang phyur yang dag mtho
yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ni lo stong du gnas par gyur to/ /dam pa'i chos nub nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang lo stong
du gnas par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho yongs su mya ngan las
'das pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas pa na dge slong dang / dge slong ma gang dag tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos
